body: @LyleSmash - did you make the project with `2.2rc3`? and/or you should roll up to `2.2`, also, it fails to plot; do you have all the original images on this machine?

I am not sure how to "roll up" or check which version I made the project with. However, the images were not in the server as you suggested. I reran a new training network but I came up with a similar error when running the evaluate network. Here is the code from the last iteration until running the evaluation. I am using an RTX5000 GPU during this session. The ending error is

Your deeplabcut.yaml file says 2.2rc3. The best thing to try would be to do a fresh install of deeplabcut following the latest instructions (new yaml file). Remake your training data, retrain, and try to evaluate. 

However, the error you are seeing is because deeplabcut canâ€™t find the proper images from the training dataset in the project folder on this computer.
agree with @backyardbiomech it seems it cannot read the data; so either the drive is not accessible to the GPU or data is moved, etc!
